185423305.review:
Game 6/365

I thought I would give this game a try as part of a 1 game a day challenge I set myself for the next year.

This is a really nice, fun game to play. On starting up the game you are presented with some nice low poly graphics. A short cut scene sets the story for the game. Basically you put on a mask and become a kung fu warrior.

As you progress across the landscape you will come up again various baddies who you use your new found karate skills to take out. The game has a nice system of different karate stances which change your attacks and moves depending on the situation.

On a whole the game play was smooth. Dodging enemies was a little awkward but didnt distract from the game.

I enjoyed playing this game and would definately come back to progress through the game some more!

Graphics 3/5
Gameplay 4/5
Replayability 3/5
Difficulty 3/5

185234097.review: This is one of those games where if you get into it, then you're in. "Getting in" means actually understanding whats going on and how to apply what you learned, and will continue to learn. Like most fighting games, story is an afterthought with potential lore to speculate on. This game can sink its three hooks into, 100% unique combat, "fashion souls" customizing your characters look that could last a life time, and custom fighting styles via the combat deck editor. The only satisfying thing left to do is fight other players in this game. Sure there's lfg discords, but due to the games jank and it's terrible netcode, often times it doesn't matter how good your internet is. There's always some kind of hitch or issue where attacks don't work like they should, or animations just straight up break. Variability should be 100% on the player with as little influence from internet connection as possible, instead of the games jank stepping in whenever it feels like it.

185226602.review:
Had this game on console and coming back to it on PC. Very addicting and competetive as well!

If you are looking into buying this title ill explain the key points
-Souls type arcade game
-stance mechanism like For Honor / Sekiro
-Learn new martial arts moves and styles through combat
-Make your style better by using the techniques you've learned and creating a "deck" coordinating with each stance

The game is very easy to learn, but hard to master. Very much worth the money and can easily steal around 100 hours from you.

184473758.review:
Eu joguei a demo desse jogo alguns anos atrás e curtir bastante. 
Atualmente eu pude compra para jogar novamente e o que eu senti jogando foi como se eu tivesse jogando uma demostração. Bem, eu paguei R$ 8,89 reais se o jogo fosse 20 reais ou R$ 88,99 esse valor seria um absurdo. 

A jogabilidade é boa para quem vai jogar utilizando o controle, porém quem tive no teclado inicialmente e confusa e vai demora um pouco para você acostumar com o game. Não é um jogo ruim, mas falta conteúdo. 

Sé você sabe o que está fazendo e para onde vc zera o jogo no mesmo dia. 
Depois que vc zera o jogo, resta vc fica lutando com os mesmo bross busca jogadores para fica no PVP.
Falta conteúdo para esse jogo, mas eu acredito que seja um projeto "pequeno" para criar outro jogo melhorado EX: SIFU e outros. 

Recomendo que compre para jogar com amigos, sé for sozinho... não recomendo não. 
É bem curto e quando vc pega o jeito vc vai longe. Porém esse longe e até a esquina kkkkkkkkk.

在之前就更新中文了，也是感谢作者I updated Chinese before.Thanks to the author,(It is suggested that the author continue to update and optimize the game)(Add animation of enemy's execution)

《赦免者》（Absolver）是一款优缺点较为明显的动作角色扮演游戏，以下是对其的评价：
 
优点
 
- 独特的战斗系统：游戏的战斗系统设计独特，玩家可以通过组合不同的招式来自定义自己的战斗风格。招式丰富多样，有攻击、闪避、佯攻以及反击等，并且每个招式都有起始姿态和结束姿态，玩家需要根据实际情况进行合理的连招组合，增加了战斗的策略性和趣味性。
- 丰富的武术动作：包含了多种武术风格，如 Kahlt method、Windfall、Forsaken 等，每种风格都有其独特的技能和动作，还可以习得所有的招式，让玩家可以根据自己的喜好选择不同的战斗方式，体验不同武术风格的魅力。
- 流畅的动作体验：游戏中的战斗动作流畅且富有打击感，玩家在战斗中能够感受到拳拳到肉的快感，使战斗过程更加爽快和刺激。
- 开放世界探索：游戏设定在一个开放的世界中，玩家可以自由探索，发现隐藏的任务和秘密，增加了游戏的探索性和自由度。
- 角色定制性强：玩家可以高度定制自己的角色外观，包括服装、装备和颜色等，还能定制角色的招式表，使每个角色都独一无二，满足了玩家个性化的需求。
- 多人互动有趣：支持多人在线合作和 PVP 战斗，玩家可以与其他玩家组队共同完成任务，也可以在 PVP 竞技场中与其他玩家进行激烈的对战，测试自己的战斗技巧，增加了游戏的社交性和竞技性。
 
缺点
 
- 单人剧情薄弱：单人剧情非常简单，缺乏深度和复杂性，剧情与游戏的结合不够紧密，无法给玩家带来强烈的代入感和情感共鸣。
- 游戏内容有限：游戏中的场景和任务相对较少，重复度较高，玩家在游戏后期可能会感到单调和乏味。此外，游戏中的敌人种类也不够丰富，战斗的多样性受到一定的限制。
- 游戏优化不足：存在一些 BUG 和卡顿现象，尤其是在多人模式下，可能会影响玩家的游戏体验。游戏的加载时间也较长，有时需要等待较长时间才能进入游戏或切换场景。
- 缺乏新手引导：游戏的战斗系统较为复杂，对于新手玩家来说，上手难度较大，而游戏中缺乏足够的新手引导，玩家可能需要花费较长时间来熟悉游戏的操作和规则。

"Absolver" is an action role-playing game with distinct advantages and disadvantages. Here is an evaluation of it:
 
Advantages
 
- Unique Combat System: The combat system of the game is uniquely designed. Players can customize their combat styles by combining different moves. There is a rich variety of moves, including attacks, dodges, feints, and counterattacks. Each move has a starting and ending stance, and players need to make reasonable combo combinations according to the actual situation, increasing the strategic and interesting nature of the combat.
- Rich Martial Arts Moves: It incorporates multiple martial arts styles, such as Kahlt method, Windfall, Forsaken, etc. Each style has its unique skills and moves, and players can also learn all the moves, allowing them to choose different combat methods according to their preferences and experience the charm of different martial arts styles.
- Smooth Action Experience: The combat actions in the game are smooth and have a strong sense of impact. Players can feel the pleasure of intense combat, making the combat process more exciting and thrilling.
- Open World Exploration: The game is set in an open world where players can freely explore and discover hidden tasks and secrets, enhancing the exploration and freedom of the game.
- Highly Customizable Characters: Players can highly customize the appearance of their characters, including clothing, equipment, and colors. They can also customize the character's move list, making each character unique and satisfying the players' personalized needs.
- Interesting Multiplayer Interaction: It supports multiplayer online cooperation and PVP battles. Players can team up with other players to complete tasks together or engage in intense battles in the PVP arena to test their combat skills, increasing the social and competitive nature of the game.
 
Disadvantages
 
- Weak Single-Player Storyline: The single-player storyline is very simple, lacking depth and complexity. The combination of the storyline and the game is not close enough, failing to bring a strong sense of immersion and emotional resonance to the players.
- Limited Game Content: The scenes and tasks in the game are relatively few, with a high degree of repetition. Players may feel monotonous and dull in the later stage of the game. In addition, the types of enemies in the game are not rich enough, and the diversity of combat is somewhat limited.
- Insufficient Game Optimization: There are some bugs and stuttering phenomena, especially in the multiplayer mode, which may affect the players' gaming experience. The loading time of the game is also relatively long, and sometimes it takes a long time to enter the game or switch scenes.
- Lack of Newbie Guidance: The combat system of the game is rather complex, and for novice players, the learning curve is relatively steep. However, there is a lack of sufficient newbie guidance in the game, and players may need to spend a long time getting familiar with the game's operation and rules.

184066586.review:
It's been a while since I've found a combat-based game that I actually like, most of the time I just play co-op games, pve games, things like that.
Not when it comes to Absolver. Honestly, I feel like this game should get a lot more attention than it's given, the combination of strategy, quick thinking, and constant adaptation when fighting is so immersive, I lose track of time.
My only complaint would be that it's really difficult to deal with the twins bossfight, but aside from that, the game is extremely fun, it feels great teaming up with someone, trying to avoid hurting each other while fighting for a common goal, being revived by random strangers and just hanging out with them is so much fun.
I'm not much of a pvp person as mentioned before, but I'd gladly spar with someone else if they were down for it.
It's a real shame this game is so unpopular to people. I never thought I'd say that a pvp game would hold a place in my heart forever, but I certainly have more than enough room for Absolver to take it's place there.
I highly recommend this game, don't let it die just because most people don't see it.

183915951.review:
dos mesmos criadores de sifu, vem ai....absolver! basicamente um sifu online, mas sem a dificuldade insana do mesmo e com muitas mecanicas legais que levam você a se interessar mais pelo jogo.

primeiramente, vou citar a mecânica que mais me interessou: mecanica de aprendizagem. a forma de você aprender novos golpes é simplesmente incrivel, ao invés de gastar pontos em uma arvore de habilidades, você aprende golpes apanhando. bem, na verdade não apanhando, mas sim defendendo ou esquivando dos golpes/dando parry (isso depende da classe/estilo de luta que você começar) e ganhando experiencia no aprendizado dos mesmos através disso. mas o exp do movimento só é contado se você vencer a luta! então cuidado pra não ser derrotado

segundamente, personalização: a personalização dos seus movimentos de luta são quase como se você criasse uma nova arte marcial do zero, tanto no combate desarmado quanto no combate com luvas e espadas

terceiramente, o preço: em questão monetaria, esse jogo não é caro. na verdade....para a qualidade que me foi apresentada, esse jogo vale até mais do que o preço que paguei por ele (8 reais em promoção), então se você está com medo de investir muito e perder dinheiro, não se preocupe, pois o jogo é barato (mas como sempre, espere uma promoção, sabemos que a steam faz diversas ao longo do ano)

183866364.review:
Absolver – это файтинг, где ты берёшь на себя роль воина, который учится боевым искусствам. Действие происходит в довольно интересном мире, названном Галдур. Варианты тут разные: ты можешь сразиться с NPC или другими игроками, исследовать мир и выполнять квесты.

Что касается графики, то она стилизованная, ни разу не реалистичная, но выглядит классно. Все цвета яркие, а мир довольно красивый, хотя и немного пустоватый. Музыка и звуковое сопровождение тоже на уровне, что помогает создать атмосферу приключения.

Правда мёртвый мультиплеер сильно портит впечатления от игры в 2024 году, но побегать в кооперативе с другом даже сейчас может быть весело, особенно в DLC.

Reviewing every game I've played in my Steam Library. Game  30

It's an interesting game let down by obscure design.

A CoOp brawler with poor level design and certain online requirements to pass to the next level (unfortunately I didn't play long enough to have to do this). 

Learning new fighting moves and the combat system is probably the most interesting part of this game.

It's fun for a short time but overall it just doesn't have enough content to stay interesting beyond an hour or two.
